T02D2259:307a-29: de'i phyir mi byed pa byed pa byed cing /
T02D2259:307a-30: byed pa mi byed ba'i phyir dge ba'o //
T02D2259:307a-31: gzhan mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ma na sye zhes bya ste /
T02D2259:307a-33: de dag ni yid la byed pa'i chos te /
T02D2259:307a-34: mi dge ba 'byung ba'i phyir 'khor bar brtag par bya ste /
T02D2259:307a-35: gal te klu dag sha ka'i gtsug gi nor bu bzhin du bstan par mi nus so ;
T02D2259:307a-37: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis rnam
T02D2259:307a-38: par thams cad kyi mchog bka' drin nyams su myong
T02D2259:307a-39: bar nus so // gal te phyag rgya chen po
T02D2259:307a-40: la skad cig ma bzhir mi gzhag pa ci zhe
T02D2259:307a-41: bar nus so // na / dri ma med pa dang rang rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2259:307b-0: 'o na bsams @307b na dri mar gyur pa'i phyir //
T02D2259:307b-1: bsam par mi rigs so zhe na /
T02D2259:307b-2: gnas pa med pa 'bad pa dang bral ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
T02D2259:307b-3: dpyad pa las ma byung bar bsgom mo //
T02D2259:307b-4: de dag kyang bsam par bya ba dpyad nas mi
T02D2259:307b-5: sems ba de'i tshe bsam pa mi 'byung ba'i ye
T02D2259:307b-6: shes lhun gyis grub pa'i mi rtog par brjod do
T02D2259:307b-7: // de bas na bsam par byed pa'i rgyu med /
T02D2259:307b-8: rgyu med pas bsam bya med pa ma yin te yod do //
T02D2259:307b-9: chad par 'gyur ro zhen ma yin te /
T02D2259:307b-10: de bzhin dang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du byas pa'i nyams su myong ba'i phyir mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2259:307b-11: 'o na rnam par rig pa dang khyad med do zhen /
T02D2259:307b-12: 'dir ni sgyu ma lta bu yan sgro btags pa ste //
T02D2259:307b-13: dbu mar sgro btags par zhen pa med do //
T02D2259:307b-15: dbu ma la khyad ci yod ce na //
T02D2259:307b-16: rnam rig ni rnam par rtog pas brtags pa'i shes pa dngos su yod par rig la /
T02D2259:307b-17: ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi dngos po yod pa ni rjes su thob po //
T02D2259:307b-18: rnam pa dang gnyis med kyi tshogs su nyams su myong pa ni gsal ba ste ma rtogs pa'o /
T02D2259:307b-19: dbu ma ni sems can gyi don phyir kun rdzob tu tha snyad brtags la //
T02D2259:307b-20: byis pa dag la don dam zhes mthong par bya
T02D2259:307b-21: pa'i phyir ji srid du blos yul du byas nga
T02D2259:307b-22: thams cad ni kun rdzob tu brtags la //
T02D2259:307b-23: de yang mthun pa'i rkyen tshogs pa tsam la snang zhing /
T02D2259:307b-24: snang ba'i rgyun slu pa'i chos can yin pas sgyu mar mthong par byas te //
T02D2259:307b-25: de yang bdag la ltos nas skad cig mar bzhag la /
T02D2259:307b-26: cha shas dang bcas pa'i phyir rang bzhin med pa ste /
T02D2259:307b-27: de yang rtag pa dang chad pa gnyis med pa las 'das pa ste /
T02D2259:307b-28: rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa
T02D2259:307b-29: dri ma med pa'i cha blo yul du ma byas
T02D2259:307b-31: de yang smig rgyu la chur 'du shes pa'i dus nyid nas /
T02D2259:307b-32: chu med de chur 'du shes pa dang cu med pa gnyis tha mi da pa nyid la /
T02D2259:307b-33: smig rgyu bsal bar bya ba nyid dam cu bsgrub
T02D2259:307b-34: pa cung zad kyang med pa bzhin du 'khor ba
T02D2259:307b-36: mya ngan las 'das pa bsgrub par bya ba med do //
T02D2259:307b-37: de yang zung du 'jug pa ste /
T02D2259:308a-1: la gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa'o //
T02D2259:308a-2: de yang mthar thug pa'i don ni //
T02D2259:308a-4: kun du rtog pas ma brtags pas //
T02D2259:308a-5: rab tu mi gnas pa yi sku //
T02D2259:308a-6: dran pa med pa'i yid la byed //
T02D2259:308a-7: dmigs pa med la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2259:308a-8: zhes bya ba la de dag ni lta ba dang bsgom pa dang spyod pa dang /
T02D2259:308a-9: dbyer mi phyed pa gsum du shes par bya'o //
T02D2259:308a-10: de yang kun du rtog pas ma brtags pas dpyad pa gnyis dang bral ba ni spyod pa'o //
T02D2259:308a-11: bde ba dang stong pa rab tu mi gnas shing //
T02D2259:308a-12: 'dod pa gnyid dang bral ba ni bde ba chen po'i sku ste lta ba'o //
T02D2259:308a-14: dngos gzhi dang mjug gi go rims kyi dran pa med pas yid la byed pa ni bsgom pa'o //
T02D2259:308a-15: gsum du brtags pas dbyer mi phyed pa ni dmigs pa med pas te /
T02D2259:308a-16: de dag la goms pa med pa ni phyag 'tshal
T02D2259:308a-17: ba'o zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag gi
T02D2259:308a-18: phyag rgya chen por rig par bya'o //
T02D2259:308a-19: de lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po ci yang ma
T02D2259:308a-20: yin pa'i bde ba chen po las dam tshig phyag
T02D2259:308a-21: rgya mchog gi 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2259:308a-23: gal te phyag rgya chen po lhan cig skyes pa
T02D2259:308a-24: las dga' bral dam tshig phyag rgya 'byung bar mi
T02D2259:308a-26: de la yang gsung rab las //
T02D2259:308a-27: gang zhig n+ya gro dha 'dod pas //
T02D2259:308a-28: ma ri sha dag srung 'gyur na /
T02D2259:308a-29: de ni ma ri sha nyid de //
T02D2259:308a-30: rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med bzhin //
T02D2259:308a-31: bde bas gang bar 'dod pa la //
T02D2259:308a-32: phyag rgya chen po thob gyur nas //
T02D2259:308a-33: grub pa med par rmi lam lta //
T02D2259:308a-34: gzugs ni snang bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2259:308a-35: zhes bya ba la rgyal po gang zhig bsil ba la mos pas /
T02D2259:308a-36: shing n+ya gro dha 'dod pa'i phyir shing ma ri
T02D2259:308a-37: sha dag bskrun par gyur na n+ya gro dha skye
T02D2259:308a-38: bar 'gyur te / rgyu ma ri sha las n+ya gro dha skyes pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2259:308a-39: n+ya gro dha de dag shugs kyis 'byung bar zad
T02D2259:308a-40: kyi ma ri sha las 'byung ba de ni ma
T02D2259:308a-42: rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pa bzhin du grags chen gyis dang /
T02D2259:308a-43: de las gzhan pa'i sems can rmas la bde bas
T02D2259:308a-44: gang bar 'dod pa las phyag rgya chan po mchog
T02D2259:308a-45: thob par gyur nas longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul
T02D2259:308a-46: pa'i sku grub pa med par rmi lam lta bu'i
T02D2259:308b-0: gzugs @308b ni shugs kyis snang bar gyur pa yin
T02D2259:308b-1: no // aa de dag ni phyag rgya chen po
T02D2259:308b-2: dri ma dang bral ba'i 'bras bu nges par bstan
T02D2259:308b-3: no // pas te / gnyis pa la ltos pa'i phyir gsum pa'o //
T02D2259:308b-4: de ltar bdag don yongs su rdzogs par bstan nas //
T02D2259:308b-5: da ni gzhan don phun sum tshogs par bya ste /
T02D2259:308b-6: h'um dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D2259:308b-7: h'um ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i yi ge ste /
T02D2259:308b-8: ha ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes te de dag yod pa dang /
T02D2259:308b-9: med pa dang gnyis dang gnyis med pa las mi skye ba'i phyir rgyu med pa'o //
T02D2259:308b-10: au ni rtag pa dang chad ba dang /
T02D2259:308b-13: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs dang bral ba'o //
T02D2259:308b-14: aa ni mtha' thams cad dang bral ba ste /
T02D2259:308b-16: ye shes lnga'i tshul nyid kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D2259:308b-17: de bas na mar gyur pa'i phyir bskyed pa dang /
T02D2259:308b-18: sna tshogs su 'char ba'i phyir spro ba dang de nyid las gnas pa'i phyir bsdu ba dang /
T02D2259:308b-19: rang rig mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2259:308b-20: dam tshig ni snying rje chen so kun nas bslang
T02D2259:308b-21: pa'i bsam pas slob dpon nam dkon mchog gsum gyi
T02D2259:308b-22: spyan sngar gzhan gyi don las 'ches pa dang 'jig
T02D2259:308b-23: rten pa'i sa nyid la gzhan gyi don dgos pa
T02D2259:308b-24: dang chos kyi phyag rgya nyams su myong nas gzhan
T02D2259:308b-26: phyag rgya ni de lta bu'i smon lam gyi stobs
T02D2259:308b-27: kyis sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la rten gzhal
T02D2259:308b-28: yas khang brten pa lha'i 'khor lo dang bcas pa
T02D2259:308b-29: / mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rab tu spras shing dbang po'i spyod yul du gyur pa ste /
T02D2259:308b-30: skus chos ston pa rnams dang /
T02D2259:308b-31: sgrub po dag la rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gnas pa dag la chos ston pa dang /
T02D2259:308b-32: mthun par snang ba la sh'akya seng ge lta bu dang /
T02D2259:308b-33: thun mong du sna tshogs su shar ba ni /
T02D2259:308b-34: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu de /
T02D2259:308b-35: phyag rgya chen po rnam par dag pa'i chos sku'i gco bo las /
T02D2259:308b-36: snang ba shin tu dag pa dang /
T02D2259:308b-38: snang ba thun mong ba rnams la longs spyod rdzogs
T02D2259:308b-39: pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i rnam pa 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D2259:309a-0: ro // de bas na slob dpon dharm'a @309a * //
T02D2259:309a-2: de'i phyir yang dag yang dag min //
T02D2259:309a-3: gang gang shin tu sgom pa las //
T02D2259:309a-4: bsgom pa'i stobs kyis rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2259:309a-5: bde gsal mi rtog dgos pa can //
T02D2259:309a-6: zhes bya bas rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2259:309a-7: de yang phyag rgya chen po nyid snang ba'i phyir /
T02D2259:309a-8: rang bzhin te zhes bya ba la /
T02D2259:309a-9: de yang rnam med rjes thob lta bu ni ma yin te /
T02D2259:309a-10: nor bu rin po che dang dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
T02D2259:309a-11: bum pa bzang po bzhin no //
T02D2259:309a-12: de bas na 'bras bu dam tshig gi phyag rgyar rig par bya'o //
T02D2259:309a-13: sems can gyi phyir 'das pa'i rgyun nye bar bzung
T02D2259:309a-14: bar rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka la sogs
T02D2259:309a-16: sems can gyi don ni theg pa chen po rnams kyis bsgrub bya yin la /
T02D2259:309a-17: de nyid kyi phyir snying rje dang /
T02D2259:309a-18: smon lam gyi phyir 'das pa ste /
T02D2259:309a-19: rgyun ni des 'brengs ma chad par nye bar bzung bas /
T02D2259:309a-20: sgrub byed yin la sgrub pa la rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka dang /
T02D2259:309a-21: rgyud sde bzhi'i lha tshogs la sogs pa ste /
T02D2259:309a-22: gzhan gyi rtog pa dang mthun par 'phros pa ni spro ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2259:309a-23: rgyu'i dus su ji ltar bslab par bya zhe na bstan par bya ste /
T02D2259:309a-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje slob dpon gyi
T02D2259:309a-25: dbang blangs te zhes bya ba ni bshad 'dzin no
T02D2259:309a-26: // de dag gi lam ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2259:309a-27: lha'i 'khor lo lha'i rnam pa ye shes lnga'i rang
T02D2259:309a-28: bzhin cho ga lngar brtags pa ni me long lta
T02D2259:309a-29: bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02D2259:309a-32: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par 'gyur pa dang /
T02D2259:309a-33: smon pa'i tshul du bsgom pa de yang sbyor ba dang po dang /
T02D2259:309a-34: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang las rgyal po mchog go //
T02D2259:309a-35: rdzogs pa'i rim pa rnam par brtag pa ni //
T02D2259:309a-37: phra mo'i rnal 'byor dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgom
T02D2259:309a-38: pa'i slob dpon gyi ni bsod nams chen po byas
T02D2259:309a-39: par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i dbang
T02D2259:309a-40: gi lus ngag par byed pa ste /
T02D2259:309a-41: dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid yin pas //
T02D2259:309a-42: spros pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir skal pa tha ma dag gis bsgrub par byas te /
T02D2259:309a-43: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang blangs la bdag dang gzhan grol ba dang /
T02D2259:309a-44: dgrol ba dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2259:309b-0: @309b de yang dang por phyag rgya chen por gyur pa'i phyir snying rje dang /
T02D2259:309b-1: sangs rgyas pa'i rtags nyid kyi phyir khrus dang byug pa dang /
T02D2259:309b-2: skal pa dang ldan pa'i phyir lha'i nga rgyal dang
T02D2259:309b-3: bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir tshogs bsags pa dang
T02D2259:309b-4: / don du 'gyur bya ba'i phyir tshad med pa bzhi dang /
T02D2259:309b-5: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo bstan pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2259:309b-6: bar chos zhi bar bya ba'i phyir srung ba'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D2259:309b-7: chos thams cad rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
T02D2259:309b-8: chos kyi dbyings las skye ba'i phyir nam mkha' byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2259:309b-9: rten gyi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir gzhal yas khang
T02D2259:309b-10: dang gnas khang gi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir gdan
T02D2259:309b-11: padma dang / bzhon pa'i zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir nyi zla'i gdan dang /
T02D2259:309b-12: gos kyi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir glang po che dang stag gi pags pa dang /
T02D2259:309b-13: rgyan gyi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir dur khrod kyi rgyan dang /
T02D2259:309b-14: byug pa'i zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir thal ba'i byug pa dang /
T02D2259:309b-15: ltos pa'i 'jigs pa'i zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir gces bu'i stang stabs dang /
T02D2259:309b-16: 'khor gyi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir lta'i tshogs dang /
T02D2259:309b-17: lus dag yid kyi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir de nyid gsum dang /
T02D2259:309b-18: skye mched kyi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir sems dpa' drug dang /
T02D2259:309b-19: 'byung ba zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D2259:309b-20: lus kyi zhen pa zlog pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor du blta ba dang /
T02D2259:309b-21: 'dod chags dag pa'i don du bde chen gyi sbyor pa dang /
T02D2259:309b-22: zhe sdang dag pa'i don du he ru ka'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2259:309b-23: gti mug dag pa'i don du mi shes pa'i do kho na nyid dang /
T02D2259:309b-24: nga rgyal dag pa'i don du skye ba med pa'i phyir myong ba dang /
T02D2259:309b-25: phrag dog dag pa'i don du mnyam pa la ma yengs pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D2259:309b-26: srog gcod pa'i nyes pa dag pa'i don du rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D2259:309b-27: ma byin par len pa dag pa'i don du rlung 'byung 'jug gi gnas dran pa dang /
T02D2259:309b-28: mi tshangs pa spyod pa dag pa'i don du phra mo'i thig le dang /
T02D2259:309b-29: brdzun du smra pa dag pa'i don du rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang /
T02D2259:309b-30: phra ma dag pa'i don du bla ma la bstod pa dang /
T02D2259:309b-31: tshig 'khyal pa dag pa'i don du rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa dang /
T02D2259:310a-1: pa'i don du bzlas pa dang /
T02D2259:310a-2: chags sems dag pa'i don du sems la lta ba dang /
T02D2259:310a-3: gnod sems dag pa'i don du yul la lta ba dang /
T02D2259:310a-4: log lta dag pa'i don du stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can dang /
T02D2259:310a-5: ser sna dag pa'i don du ma chags pa dang /
T02D2259:310a-6: 'chal pa dag pa'i don du blo rlabs po che dang mi 'bral ba dang /
T02D2259:310a-7: khong khro bdag pa'i don du kun la rang gi lhar lta ba dang /
T02D2259:310a-8: le lo dag pa'i don du thob par dka' ba'i 'chi bar myur ba lta ba dang /
T02D2259:310a-9: g-yeng ba dag pa'i don du mgo na po bsten pa dang /
T02D2259:310a-10: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa dag pa'i don du

T02D2259:310a-13: zas kyi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir bdud rtsi rnam
T02D2259:310a-14: pa lnga bsten pa dang tshogs su gyur par yang
T02D2259:310a-15: bya ste / mi mthun pa dag par bya ba'i
T02D2259:310a-16: don du brda'i rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par
T02D2259:310a-17: bya ste / bya'o // de las khyad par gyi
T02D2259:310a-18: don ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par

T02D2259:310a-22: bsod nams kyi tshogs khyad par can la sogs par bya ba'i phyir tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D2259:310a-23: dngos grub myur du thob par bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg dang /
T02D2259:310a-24: bla ma mnyes par bya ba'i phyir mandala dang /
T02D2259:310a-25: bkra shis par bya'i phyir chod pa dang /
T02D2259:310a-26: bar chad bzlog par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten gyi
T02D2259:310a-27: las dang shes pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2259:310a-29: slob ma bsdu bar bya'i phyir dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang /
T02D2259:310a-30: bya ba'i cha la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir rgyud la sogs par blta ba ste /
T02D2259:310a-31: de dag thams cad bdag la ltos pas gzhan gsal
T02D2259:310a-32: bar bya ba yin gyi bdag dag par bya ba
T02D2259:310a-33: la ni lha'i 'khor lo la lha'i 'khor lo'i rnam
T02D2259:310a-34: pa phung po lnga la rigs lnga'i rgyas gdab par
T02D2259:310a-35: byas te / gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2259:310a-36: tshor ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D2259:310a-37: 'du shes ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D2259:310a-38: 'du byed ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D2259:310b-0: rnam par shes @310b pa ni rdo rje mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D2259:310b-1: de yang ye shes lnga'i rnag bzhin te /
T02D2259:310b-2: sna tshogs su shar ba ni me long lta bu dang /

T02D2259:310b-7: de la mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2259:310b-8: rdo rje 'chang gi bshad pa kho nar zad do //
T02D2259:310b-9: cho ga lngar brags pa ni mngon par byang chub pa lnga ste /
T02D2259:310b-10: nyi ma dang zla ba dag la a'a li k'a lis brgyan pa dang /
T02D2259:310b-11: ro mnyam pa'i gong bu dang /
T02D2259:310b-13: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02D2259:310b-14: sku yongs su rdzogs pa rnams la byang chub kyi mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2259:310b-15: sems so sor rtog pa dang /
T02D2259:310b-16: gsung rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2259:310b-17: thugs zad mi shes pa dang /
T02D2259:310b-18: sku 'khor lo dam pa'i byang chub pa'i bdag nyid can me long lta bu dang /
T02D2259:310b-22: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang skyar bar bya'o //
T02D2259:310b-23: rnam par dag par 'gyur pa ni me tog las 'bras bu 'byung ba'o //
T02D2259:310b-24: rnon po'i tshul ni rtse gcig pa ste /
T02D2259:310b-26: de lta bu nyid du bsgom pa de yang rigs te /
T02D2259:310b-27: phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na //
T02D2259:310b-28: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags //
T02D2259:310b-29: rdo rje skye ma chen 'di dag kyang //
T02D2259:310b-32: yang sbyor ba dang po ni rnal 'byor dang rjes thob kyi rnal 'byor ro //
T02D2259:310b-33: dkyil khor rgyal po mchog ni shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
T02D2259:310b-34: las rgyal po mchog ni shin tu rnal 'byor chen po'o //
T02D2259:310b-35: de lta bu'i lam de dag kyang 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D2259:310b-36: grogs dag chu yi zla ba ni //
T02D2259:310b-37: bden pa ma yin brdzun ma yin //
T02D2259:310b-39: rang bzhin med lus gsal ba nyid //
T02D2259:310b-40: ces bya ba gsung rab las so//
T02D2259:310b-41: de dag ni shin tu brtags pa'i phyir bskyed pa'i ri pa'o //
T02D2259:310b-42: da ni yod pa gsal bar byed pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2259:310b-44: rim pa ni 'khor lo bzhi'i rim pa'o //
T02D2259:310b-45: rnam par brtag pa ni ae bam ma ya'o //
T02D2259:310b-46: thig le ni byang chub sems kyi khu bas te /
T02D2259:311a-2: / bde ba dang yid tha mi dad par byed pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
T02D2259:311a-3: phra mo ni rlung dang rtse'o //
T02D2259:311a-5: de dag yid sbyor ba byed pa ni rnal 'byor te /
T02D2259:311a-6: spros pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i phyir dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2259:311a-8: slob dpon ni dbang gi rnam par phyed pa'i gzhan gyi don no //
T02D2259:311a-9: sgrub pa po de nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir bsod nams chen po byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2259:311a-10: mchog gi 'bras bu ma yin nam zhe na /
T02D2259:311a-11: de ltar yang chos kyi phyag rgya'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D2259:311a-13: nges pa'i rgyu las nges pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la /
T02D2259:311a-14: bsod nams kyis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag par byed pa de ltar yin yang /
T02D2259:311a-15: chos kyi phyag rgya bde stong spyi'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D2259:311a-16: 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po bde stong rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
T02D2259:311a-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgya spros pa sna tshogs pa
T02D2259:311a-19: rtogs pa can gyi spyod yul zhen pa dang bcas
T02D2259:311a-20: pa 'khor ba'i rgyu de bcos ma'o //
T02D2259:311a-21: de bas na nges pa ma bcos pa'i rgyu las
T02D2259:311a-22: nges pa'i 'bras bu rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
T02D2259:311a-23: pas so // gal te bcos ma yin pa'i phyir lam tsam du yang mi rigs so zhe na /
T02D2259:311a-24: byis pa blo chung rnams kyi ni //
T02D2259:311a-25: bdag med la sogs go bya'i phyir //
T02D2259:311a-26: dge bshes dam pa mchog bsten nas //
T02D2259:311a-27: rim par de bzhin bstan par bya //
T02D2259:311a-28: zhes bya ba'i phyir dang gsung rab las /
T02D2259:311a-29: 'di dag thams cad sems cam du //
T02D2259:311a-30: thub pas gang zhig gsungs pa rnams //
T02D2259:311a-31: byis pa skrag pa spang pa'i phyir //
T02D2259:311a-32: gsungs kyi de bzhin nyid du min //
T02D2259:311a-33: zhes 'byung ba nyid kyis da bas na don dam pa rang bzhin med pa nyid de /
T02D2259:311a-34: bskyed pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2259:311a-35: 'dis ni dngos po rnams ni de kho na nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D2259:311a-36: dngos po de kho na nyid du ji ltar bsdu zhe na /
T02D2259:311a-38: de'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis gang byis pa rnams
T02D2259:311a-39: kyis brtags pa'i brtan g-yo'i dngos po thams cad lhan
T02D2259:311a-40: cig skyes pa'i nyams su myong ba'i lam gyi rtog
T02D2259:311a-41: pa dang ro gnyis su med pas de nyid du
T02D2259:311a-42: phug ste / tha mi dad pa de nyid byang
T02D2259:311b-0: chub bla na @311b med pa'i gser du gyur pa'o
T02D2259:311b-1: phug ste / // des ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lor yang dag par bsgom par 'gyur te /
T02D2259:311b-2: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2259:311b-3: de nyid nyams su myong ba lam gyi rtogs pa dang /
T02D2259:311b-4: sgro skur dang bral ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro ;
T02D2259:311b-5: / mngon par rnyed pa'i dngos grub mchog bsgoms pas 'thob po zhes bya ba la /
T02D2259:311b-6: gang de kho na nyid la rmongs pa ni byis pa ste /
T02D2259:311b-7: de lta bu rnams kyis tha snyad du brtags pa'i rig pa bag chags rab tu stug po las /
T02D2259:311b-8: rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis brtan pa dang /
T02D2259:311b-9: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la mngon zhen du
T02D2259:311b-10: bltas pas sdug bsngal du gyur pa la dpe'i lhan
T02D2259:311b-11: cig skyes pa'i las bya ba'i phyag rgya nyams su
T02D2259:311b-12: myong ba'i ro chos kyi phyag rgya lhan cig skyes
T02D2259:311b-13: pa'i gnyis su med pas rtag pa thams cad de
T02D2259:311b-15: spang bya dang blang bya tha mi dad na dper
T02D2259:311b-16: na gser 'gyur gyi rtsis lcags gser du 'gyur ba
T02D2259:311b-17: bzhin du dngos po de nyid byang chub bla na
T02D2259:311b-18: med pa'i gser du gyur pa'o //
T02D2259:311b-19: las 'dis ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med
T02D2259:311b-20: pa'i 'jig rten chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang
T02D2259:311b-21: / sprul pa gsum gyis 'khor lo dbyer mi phyed par yang dag par bsgom par 'gyur te /
T02D2259:311b-22: rtogs pa'i dus de nyid ni dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2259:311b-23: des mtshon pa'i ye shes de dag nyams su myong
T02D2259:311b-24: ba don lam gyi rtog pa dang sgro skur dang
T02D2259:311b-25: bral ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu'i rnam bsam
T02D2259:311b-26: gyis mi khyab pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa ste
T02D2259:311b-27: / de dag gis rtogs pa de dag sngon snying po don gyi sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
T02D2259:311b-29: de ltar mngon par rnyed pa'i dngos grub mchog gang gis bsgoms pas 'thob po //
T02D2259:311b-30: de dag nges par grub par nus sam zhe na /
T02D2259:311b-32: de bas na gsung rab las /
T02D2259:311b-33: 'di ni gzhal yas khang min las min dbang po min te 'byung ba la sogs min //
T02D2259:311b-34: gzugs la sogs pa ma yin srog chags min zhing mi dang gzhan ma yin te rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2259:312a-1: ni chos sku yin te dkyil 'khor pa dang lha dag dang //
T02D2259:312a-2: khams gsum 'di dag thams cad sna tshogs ma yin 'khor lor rtogs na ji ltar 'khrul par byed //
T02D2259:312a-3: ces bya ba la brtags pa 'di ni gzhal yas khang ste /
T02D2259:312a-4: bde ba chen po nyid gzhal yas khang du shar ba'i phyir /
T02D2259:312a-5: gzhal yas khang rtog pas phyag rgya chen por rig par bya ste /
T02D2259:312a-6: gzhal yas khang gsal bar bya ba'am /

T02D2259:312a-9: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus
T02D2259:312a-10: dang yid rnams kyang dbang po gzhan min te gong

T02D2259:312a-13: 'brel bcu gnyis te gzhan min no //
T02D2259:312a-14: gzugs la sogs pa ni sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya ste /
T02D2259:312a-15: de dag kyang gzhan ma yin no //
T02D2259:312a-16: srog gi rlung dang bcas pa bde sdug dang bcas pa skye shi dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2259:312a-17: de la srog chags zhes bya ba la //
T02D2259:312a-18: de yang gzhan min zhing mi dang de las gzhan

T02D2259:312a-26: lha dag dang khams gsum 'di dag thams cad dang /
T02D2259:312a-27: sna tshogs su snang ba de dag gzhan ma yin te /

T02D2259:312a-31: 'khrul pa las gzhan ma yin zhing 'khrul bar mi
T02D2259:312a-32: 'gyur bar yang phyag rgya chen po la snyegs la
T02D2259:312a-33: / mar las kyi phyag rgya la snyegs te /
T02D2259:312a-34: de yang ji ltar snyegs te /
T02D2259:312a-35: phyag rgya chen po ma bcos pa bzhin chos rgya
T02D2259:312a-36: yang ma bcos pas yar snyegs la las rgya la
T02D2259:312a-37: dga' ba bzhi yod pa bzhin du chos rgya la
T02D2259:312a-38: yang dga' ba bzhi yod par mar snyegs so //
T02D2259:312a-39: gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi lus kyis bla ma'i ngag
T02D2259:312b-0: sngon du song bas @312b dngos grub rnam pa gnyis
T02D2259:312b-1: 'byung ba yin pas bla ma'i gdams ngag sngon du
T02D2259:312b-2: 'gro dgos pas chos rgya gtan la dbab par rigs
T02D2259:312b-4: las kyi phyag rgya lus la ste //
T02D2259:312b-5: chos kyi phyag rgya ngag la'o //
T02D2259:312b-6: phyag rgya chen po yid la ste //
T02D2259:312b-7: dam tshig phyag rgya kun la 'gro //
T02D2259:312b-8: zhes bya bas kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D2259:312b-11: skabs su bab pa'i tshig dang /
T02D2259:312b-12: ngo bo dang mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2259:312b-14: de la brjod par bya ba ni //
T02D2259:312b-16: de yang phyag rgya chen po la ltos pas spyi'i
T02D2259:312b-17: rnam pas chen po ni rang gi mtshan nyid do
T02D2259:312b-18: // skabs su bab pa'i tshig ni ae bam ste /
T02D2259:312b-19: dbyangs kyi yi ge dang gsal byed kyi yi ge'o //
T02D2259:312b-20: de yang rab tu mi gnas pa la //
T02D2259:312b-21: byin rlabs bla ma'i ngag chen po //
T02D2259:312b-22: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang //
T02D2259:312b-23: bzhi stong grags kyi rtsa ba dang //
T02D2259:312b-24: yi ge pha ma gnyis yin te //
T02D2259:312b-25: kun gyi yang ni gzhir gyur pa'o //
T02D2259:312b-26: zhes pas rgyud sde lnga la sogs pa ji ltar
T02D2259:312b-27: snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad dbyangs dang
T02D2259:312b-28: gsal byed gnyis su 'dus de yang ae bam gnyis
T02D2259:312b-29: su 'dus so // ngo bo ni bla ma'i gdams ngag sgra'i rang bzhin brjod pas /
T02D2259:312b-30: slob ma'i blo la brjod bya don spyi'i rnam par bde stong du shar pa'o //
T02D2259:312b-31: mtshan nyid ni snang stong gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D2259:312b-32: de yang snang ba shar ba'i mtshan nyid du stong ba byung la /
T02D2259:312b-33: stong pa rtogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid du snang ba byung ste de yang /
T02D2259:312b-34: stong pa bcom ldan 'das su bshad //
T02D2259:312b-37: sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams la //
T02D2259:312b-38: skye ba med pa nyid gnas pa //
T02D2259:312b-39: stong pa snang ba mtshan nyid gcig / ces pas so //
T02D2259:312b-40: phan yon la gnyis te don che ba dang /
T02D2259:312b-42: don che ba ni bla ma'i gdams ngag sgra'i stobs
T02D2259:312b-43: las slob ma'i blo la rtogs pa shar ba ni
T02D2259:312b-44: skad cig mas bsdus pa'i dga' ba bzhi skye ste

T02D2259:312b-46: dga' ba de ltar shar ba yang lhan cig skyes

T02D2259:312b-48: yid ches pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba /
T02D2259:312b-49: rjes la rags snang du shar ba dga' bral lo //
T02D2259:313a-1: thams cad la lhan cig skyes pas rgyas gdab kyin
T02D2259:313a-2: bsgom pas rang gi don du chos kyi sku phyag
T02D2259:313a-3: rgya chen po thob pa ni don che ba'o //
T02D2259:313a-4: de nas sems can gyi don gyi smon lam gyi
T02D2259:313a-5: dbang gis gzugs sku gnyis sems can gyi snang ba
T02D2259:313a-6: bdag pa dang ma dag pa'i bye brag gis longs
T02D2259:313a-7: sku dang sprul sku snang ba ni phan yon che
T02D2259:313a-8: ba'o // de lta bu la 'jug par mi nus pa la /
T02D2259:313a-9: lam gyi phyag rgya bstan pa la bzhi ste /
T02D2259:313a-10: chos 'byung du gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan dang /
T02D2259:313a-11: de nyid dpe'i ye shes su rig pa dang /
T02D2259:313a-12: dman drag gnyis sun bton pa yang dag pa'i ye shes dpe'i ye shes su rig pa dang /
T02D2259:313a-13: 'phel bar byed pa 'brel pa'i tshul gyis nyams su blangs pa'o //
T02D2259:313a-14: de la chos 'byung du gzhag pa ni rtogs shing
T02D2259:313a-15: bla ma'i gdams ngag gis zin na mya ngan las
T02D2259:313a-17: ae yi cha byad bzang po la //
T02D2259:313a-18: dbus su bam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D2259:313a-19: bde ba thams cad skyed pa'i gnas //
T02D2259:313a-20: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces gsungs pas so //
T02D2259:313a-21: ma rtogs shing bla ma'i gdams ngag gis ma zin na 'khor ba 'byung ste /
T02D2259:313a-23: yi ge ae ni mar gyur la //
T02D2259:313a-24: bam ni pha zhes bya bar grags //
T02D2259:313a-25: thig le de ni byang chub sems //
T02D2259:313a-26: de las srid pa thams cad skyes //
T02D2259:313a-27: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir chos 'byung du rigs so //
T02D2259:313a-28: de nyid dpe'i ye shes su rigs te /
T02D2259:313a-29: chos kyi phyag rgya la dga' ba bzhi yod pa
T02D2259:313a-30: bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya la yang dga' ba
T02D2259:313a-32: de yang dper na chu'i zla bas nam mkha'i zla ba mtshon nus pa bzhin du /
T02D2259:313a-33: mtshon byed dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa ni nyams su myong la /
T02D2259:313a-34: mtshon bya don gyi lhan cig skyes pa ni mtshon par nus la dngos ni ma yin te /
T02D2259:313a-35: 'dra ba'i phyir na dper rigs so //
T02D2259:313a-37: don gyis 'dra ba gang yin pa //
T02D2259:313a-38: dpe dag la ni brten par 'gyur //
T02D2259:313a-40: dman drag gnyis sun phyung ba yang dag pa'i dbang bskur ba dper gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2259:313a-41: de yang drag po'i dbang ni /
T02D2259:313a-42: go rims dang gnas dang rtogs pa gsum las 'khrul te /
T02D2259:313a-43: de yang go rims la 'khrul pa ni /
T02D2259:313a-44: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i skad cig ma dang /
T02D2259:313b-0: lhan cig @313b skyes pa'i dga' ba mthar 'dod la rnam par nyed pa'i skad cig ma dang /
T02D2259:313b-1: dga' bral gyi ye shes gsum par 'dod do //
T02D2259:313b-2: gnas la 'khrul pa ni rdo rje nor bur byang
T02D2259:313b-3: chub kyi sems kyis khyab pa la lhan cig skyes
T02D2259:313b-5: rtogs pa la 'khrul pa ni rdo rje nor bu
T02D2259:313b-6: la byang chub sems kyis khyab pa ni mchog dga'i
T02D2259:313b-7: ye shes te rang gi ba tsam rtogs pa ste
T02D2259:313b-8: de la dngos po'i gshis yin zer bas 'khrul lo
T02D2259:313b-9: // dbang bskur nges pa ni go rims mi 'khrul
T02D2259:313b-10: yang gnas dang rtogs pa las 'khrul te rtogs pa
T02D2259:313b-11: ni nor bu'i nang du byang sems kyis khyab pa
T02D2259:313b-12: la dngos po'i gshis rtogs par 'dod pa'o //
T02D2259:313b-13: gnas ni rdo rje bum pa la khyab pa la ngos 'dzin pas so //
T02D2259:313b-14: des na de gnyis ni dper mi rigs so //
T02D2259:313b-15: yang dag pa'i dbang dpe'i ye shes su gzhag pa ni byang chub kyi sems ma nor ba ste /
T02D2259:313b-16: dang po'o byed 'khyud pa nas brtsams nas rdo rje'i
T02D2259:313b-17: mgrin pa man chad du khyab pa la dga' ba
T02D2259:313b-18: nor bu'i nang du khyab pa la mchog dga'/
T02D2259:313b-19: gnyis shor gnyis gnas par de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ste /
T02D2259:313b-20: gnyis shor bas 'dod chags kyi dad yal /
T02D2259:313b-21: gnyis gnas pa de la rigs kyi bdag po'i kha
T02D2259:313b-22: na gnas pa de ni rdo rje 'chang gi thig
T02D2259:313b-23: le stong pa mdzes pa'i spyi bo na gnas pa

T02D2259:313b-25: / de gnyis kyang rgyu 'bras su byas nas rdo
T02D2259:313b-26: rje 'chang gi thig le des ni rang bzhin med
T02D2259:313b-27: par byas pas rtag pa'i mtha' bsal /
T02D2259:313b-28: mi bskyod pa'i thig les rdo rje 'chang gi thig
T02D2259:313b-29: le rgyas btab pas rang bzhin med pa nyams su

T02D2259:313b-33: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas btab cing //
T02D2259:313b-34: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas gdab //
T02D2259:313b-35: 'di ni bde chen rgyal po yin //
T02D2259:313b-37: gzhan yang rab tu mi gnas pa las //
T02D2259:313b-38: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin ni //
T02D2259:313b-39: mchog dga'i mtha' dang dga' bral gong //
T02D2259:313b-41: mi bskyod rdo rje las ltung zhing //
T02D2259:313b-42: rdo rje 'chang chen padmar reg / rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas btab pas //

T02D2259:324a-34: bdag nyid gzhung du bstan pa'o //
T02D2259:324a-35: gsum pa brdar shes par bya ba la bzhi ste /
T02D2259:324a-36: las kyi phyag rgya byang chub kyi shing ltar bshad pa dang /
T02D2259:324a-37: chos kyi phyag rgya gser gyi 'khor lo ltar bshad pa dang /
T02D2259:324a-38: phyag rgya chen po shing na+ya gro dha ltar bshad pa dang /
T02D2259:324a-39: dam tshig gi phyag rgya aa ru ra'i snying po ltar bshad pa'o //
T02D2259:324a-40: de yang byang chub kyi shing dang /
T02D2259:324a-41: las kyi phyag rgya la 'brel pa ci yod ce na /
T02D2259:324b-0: he ru @324b ka bzang po'i rgyud las /
T02D2259:324b-1: rig ma mchan dang ldan zhing lang tsho gzhon //
T02D2259:324b-2: byang chub sems kyis gang ba'i dang tshul ni //
T02D2259:324b-3: byang chub shing gi sdong po yal 'dab la //
T02D2259:324b-4: shin tu 'jam zhing mnyen la'i mas gang //
T02D2259:324b-5: dkar po lnga tshan gsum du skyes 'gyur te //
T02D2259:324b-6: nag po'i ngos gnyis dkar po gcig tu 'bar //
T02D2259:324b-7: bcu tshan bcu dang lnga ni 'bras bur gnas //
T02D2259:324b-8: nag po'i phye ma thig le gcig 'bab pa //
T02D2259:324b-9: gang gis 'thungs pas nad kun rnam par 'joms //
T02D2259:324b-10: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya rtogs pa can //
T02D2259:324b-11: bsten zhing lhan cig skyes pa dran pa yis //
T02D2259:324b-12: las kyi phyag rgya bde bar cher skyes te //
T02D2259:324b-13: sbyangs la gnas pa'i 'bras bu smin pa ni //
T02D2259:324b-14: rtogs dang ldan pa'i he ru ka nyid phyir //
T02D2259:324b-15: rnal 'byor brda la rab tu mkhas rnams kyi //
T02D2259:324b-16: spyod yul yin phyir byang chub shing gzung bya //
T02D2259:324b-19: chos rgyal 'brel pa ci yod ce na /
T02D2259:324b-20: slob dpon k'a ma la'i zhal nas gsungs te /
T02D2259:324b-21: rga shi rnam rtog gzung 'dzin rnam rtog gcod //
T02D2259:324b-22: mu khyud lta bu'i rtogs pa nyams su blangs //
T02D2259:324b-23: rtsibs rnams mnyam par rtogs pa ro mnyam ste //
T02D2259:324b-24: mtshan nyid gser gyi rang bzhin dang 'dra la //
T02D2259:324b-25: bde stong gnyis med shes pa cha snyoms pa //
T02D2259:324b-26: 'khor lo'i ngos gnyis khor yug mnyam pa bzhin //
T02D2259:324b-29: shing n+ya gro dha la 'brel pa ci yod cen /
T02D2259:324b-31: n+ya gro rtse mthon shing rnams yal ga dang //
T02D2259:324b-32: sdong po dri ma dag gis dben pa ste //
T02D2259:324b-33: thang chu rtsi 'thungs tsha grang gnyis ka sel //
T02D2259:324b-34: rtsa bzangs sbom dang yan lag du ma rgyas //
T02D2259:324b-35: sa phyogs dug sel dus rnams kun du gsar //
T02D2259:324b-36: chu zheng gab pa dbyar dgun med par skye //
T02D2259:324b-37: sa phyogs khor yug dri yis khyab par skye //
T02D2259:324b-38: 'bras bu me tog sil ma'i chu 'bab pa //
T02D2259:324b-39: yal ga gcig las gom gsum mnyam du 'char //
T02D2259:324b-40: de dag rgyas par skye zhing me tog 'bras //
T02D2259:325a-1: du 'char pa'i shing de ro yis skyes //
T02D2259:325a-2: ro de skyed bar nus ba ma yin te //
T02D2259:325a-3: de nyid tshogs pa rgyu rkyen rnal ma ste //
T02D2259:325a-4: lud dang ma 'dres chu yis ma bsgrubs pa'o //
T02D2259:325a-5: de dag gang yin zhe na /
T02D2259:325a-7: 'khrul dang ma 'khrul gnyis med cir yang min pa'i rtogs pa lhun gyis grub na bde //
T02D2259:325a-8: 'di la brtag mi dgos pas las dang bya ba
T02D2259:325a-9: ma sems thams cad btang na phyag rgya che zhes
T02D2259:325a-10: bya ba la / 'khrul dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2259:325a-13: ma 'khrul zhes pa ni ye shes te /
T02D2259:325a-15: gnyis med nyams su myong ba ste /
T02D2259:325a-17: cir yang min pa'i rtogs pa ni 'bras bu ste re ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D2259:325a-18: de thams cad kyang lhun gyis grub ba'i bde ba nyid kyis so //
T02D2259:325a-19: man ngag gi phyag rgya chen po 'di la gang du yang brtag mi dgos pa'o //
T02D2259:325a-20: khyad par ni dge pa'i las dang /
T02D2259:325a-21: sdig pa'i las kyi rgyud dang /
T02D2259:325a-22: rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2259:325a-23: thabs ni bya ba dang bral ba ste /
T02D2259:325a-25: 'bras bu'i mngon par zhen pa dang /
T02D2259:325a-26: gnyis pa rtags thams cad btang na phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D2259:325a-28: gang de kho na nyid bcu pa la sogs pa
T02D2259:325a-29: la don med par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin
T02D2259:325a-30: te / bsgrub bya bsgrub pa'i dus ni bkag pa yang med de lam du 'gyur bar bshad do //
T02D2259:325a-31: bsgrub bya grub pa'i dus su ni //
T02D2259:325a-32: dri ma yin pa'i phyir ched du mi bsgrub sa
T02D2259:325a-33: la thams cad de kho na nyid du 'dus pa'i
T02D2259:325a-34: phyir ro // de yang bstan par bya ste /
T02D2259:325a-36: lha dang sngags med dka' thub sbyin sreg yod ma yin //
T02D2259:325a-37: dkyil 'khor ma grub dkyil 'khor pa yang de bzhin te //
T02D2259:325a-38: zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad par zad la ldan pa'i don no //
T02D2259:325a-39: phyag rgya chen po de dag lha dang sngags dang dka' thub ste //
T02D2259:325a-40: sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor pa yang de nyid do //
T02D2259:325a-41: mnyam pa gnyis med ji bzhin par ni 'dus pa'i
T02D2259:325a-42: bdag / gang gis rtog pa grol 'gyur grol bar
T02D2259:325b-1: rgyud kyi tshogs gzhan gyis gtan la dbab par bya ste /
T02D2259:325b-3: sku bzhi dbyer med phyag rgya che //
T02D2259:325b-4: chos sku de dag lhan cig skyes //
T02D2259:325b-7: shes rab snying rje nyer bcas dang /
T02D2259:325b-8: ze bam k'a li a'a li sngags //
T02D2259:325b-11: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni /
T02D2259:325b-12: ae bam la ni rab tu zhugs //
T02D2259:325b-14: sems la bde chen 'byin pa yis //
T02D2259:325b-15: 'khor ba de ma thag tu sreg / ces pa dang /
T02D2259:325b-17: bde steng gnyis med snying po la //
T02D2259:325b-18: yid la mi byed de len byed //
T02D2259:325b-21: gnyis su med pa'i dkyil bcas pa //
T02D2259:325b-22: ro snyoms gsum byas sgrub pa po //
T02D2259:325b-25: chu rnams rgya mtshor lan tshva'i ro //
T02D2259:325b-26: chos rnams bde chen mnyam pa nyid //
T02D2259:325b-29: chu dang chu gnyis dbyer med ltar //
T02D2259:325b-30: 'khor ba nyid nas rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2259:325b-33: byang chub sems kyi chu bo nyid //
T02D2259:325b-34: ji bzhin par gzhan rgyu mi 'chad //
T02D2259:325b-37: las dang chas dang dam tshig rnams //
T02D2259:325b-38: bzhi pa'i dbang thob myong bar 'dus //
T02D2259:325b-39: gang gis bdag nyid de rtogs pa //
T02D2259:325b-41: rdo rje 'chang mchog he ru ka / nges pa'i rgyud rgyal bshad pa yin //
T02D2259:325b-42: zhes bya bas gsal ba'i phyir rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2259:325b-43: tshogs tha ma'i dang po gsal bar bya ba ni //
T02D2259:325b-44: chos rnams thams cad bde ba chen por gcig pa mnyam pa gnyis su med pa nyid do//
T02D2259:325b-45: ji bzhin pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2259:325b-46: 'dus pa'i bdag nyid chos kyi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2259:325b-47: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bzhi pa'i dus kyi ye
T02D2259:325b-48: shes gsum 'dus pas so zhes bya ba ni bsdus
T02D2259:325b-49: pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2259:325b-50: dam tshig gi phyag rgya skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni /
T02D2259:325b-51: sngon gyi skyes bu rnams kyis byas pa dang /
T02D2259:325b-52: ma 'ongs pa'i dus skyes bu'i 'bras bur bcas pa dang /
T02D2259:325b-53: nges par sbyang ba'i mthu las byung ba'i skyes bus byed pa ste /
T02D2259:325b-54: 'bras bu ni gzhan gyi don to nges pra bstan pa ste zhes pa ni /
T02D2259:325b-55: rgyu 'bras kyi 'brel pa ma bslus pa'i don to //
T02D2259:325b-56: bzhi pa ni gsum pa la ltos pa'o //
T02D2259:325b-57: byang chub mchog rgya 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2259:326a-0: @326a * // sa gnon mchog sbyin ting 'dzin skyabs //
T02D2259:326a-1: gzhan dang mthu las grub pa yi //
T02D2259:326a-4: sam do ka ae bo bhra bhu ha /
T02D2259:326a-5: de dag ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i bshad pa'o //
T02D2259:326a-6: de ltar phyag rgya bzhi'i bye brag de dag skad cig bzhi dang dga' ba bzhi dang /
T02D2259:326a-8: phyag rgya chen po ma yin gsum gyi re re zhing //
T02D2259:326a-9: skad cig ma bzhi bzhir shes bar bya'o //
T02D2259:326a-10: de skyed pa'i rgyu 'bras ni ma yin la ltos pa'i rgyu 'bras su shes par bya'o //
T02D2259:326a-11: de ni phyag rgya bzhi shin tu bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D2259:326a-12: de ltar gzhung gi don bshad nas //
T02D2259:326a-13: mtshan 'jug gi don du bshad pa ni //
T02D2259:326a-14: ham phyag rgya bzhir rjes su 'gro ba drug pa zhes bya ba la //
T02D2259:326a-15: ham ni lhan cig skyes pa'i nus pa dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2259:326a-16: aa ba dh'u t'i'i rtse mo bde chen gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil na gnas te /
T02D2259:326a-17: lus thams cad der 'dus shing de'i nus pa las
T02D2259:326a-18: mi 'da' ba bzhin du nor bu lta bu'i phyag
T02D2259:326a-19: rgya bzhir rgyud sde rnam pa lda 'dus shing de
T02D2259:326a-21: de dag ni mchog tu gyur ba gces par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2259:326a-22: sangs rgyas gsungs las rab tu lung bstan pa'i //
T02D2259:326a-23: n'a g'a rdzuna mchog las rnyed pa'i don //
T02D2259:326a-24: sar ba dang rgyal ba mchog las 'ongs //
T02D2259:326a-25: rje btsun mchog gis 'di skyon bzod pa mdzod //
T02D2259:326a-26: pha dang ma yi rgyud las 'di rtogs shing //
T02D2259:326a-27: shes rab snying rje bcas pas don 'di brtsams //
T02D2259:326a-28: rin chen snying po zhes bya'i 'grel pa 'dis //
T02D2259:326a-29: yid pham ngal sos mngon par rgyal gyur cig chos 'di byas pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02D2259:326a-32: bcu bzhi'i sa la gnas par shog / phyag rgya
T02D2259:326a-33: bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel ba rin po che'i snying po
T02D2259:326a-34: zhes bya ba // rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas
T02D2259:326a-35: par grags pa bla ma bhi ta karmas mdzad pa
T02D2259:326a-37: / rnal 'byor ba bsod snyoms pa pradzny'a shri dzny'ana k'i rtis rang 'gyur du byas pa'o /
T02D2259:326a-39: // rje btsun bhi ta karma de nyid mtshan nyid mdzad
T02D2259:326a-40: pa'i skabs su slob dpon chen po ka ro pa
T02D2259:326a-43: da ka ro zan zhes bya bar grags so //
